snippet.title: Warhammer Online Production Video Podcast #2 - Music
snippet.description: This month we join our intrepid host, Associate Producer Josh Drescher, as he risks life and limb with Brad Derrick, Lead Sound Artist for Warhammer Online, for a look at the creative process of making music for WAR. As you'll see, it involves fancy computers, expensive software, actual musical instruments, parking garages, and driving with no hands on the wheel. It's a dangerous process that results in a killer soundtrack. Don't do this at home!
